traits.name: Push
entries: Once during each of her turns, after hitting a creature with an attack, Maggie can force the target to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed up to 10 feet horizontally away from Maggie and knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Tactical Readiness
entries: Maggie and allies within 30 feet of her have advantage on initiative rolls, as long as Maggie isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Maggie makes two Giant Maul or Hammer Toss attacks.

actions.name: Giant Maul
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hammer Toss
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
